title: Instance Segmentation: Who Is Who?
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Instance Segmentation: Who Is Who?.

hook.text: There are three people in the photo. Instance segmentation colors each one differently.

buildup.text: Instance segmentation combines detection (find each object) with segmentation (label its pixels).

discovery.text: Mask R-CNN adds a pixel mask branch to the Faster R-CNN detection framework.

twist.text: It's more expensive than semantic segmentationâ€”each instance needs its own mask prediction.

climax.text: SAM (Segment Anything Model) generalized this to any object with zero-shot prompting.

quiz.question: How does instance segmentation differ from semantic segmentation?
options: It distinguishes between individual objects of the same class
